price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߝߍ߬ ߘߋ߬ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߢߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَواْ وَّٱلَّذِينَ هُم مُّحۡسِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha maʿa alladhīna ittaqaw wa-alladhīna hum muḥ'sinūna
